name: Last vestige
description:
Beedeebeep bop bop !

Discover the story of Elio, a robot created by humans, waking up in a post-apocalyptic world with no living entities other than robots from a new era. He will meet Poppy, with whom he will live great adventures.

Who we are

This game was made by the 3rd grade students of the E-Artsup school in Strasbourg, France. We are 7 students who had spent 72 days on this game, and we are happy to present you the prototype of Last Vestige. The story is an original concept from us as well as environments and characters. This project allowed us to put into action what we learned for the last 3 years.

The team
  • Artists : Oriane B. Laura K, Marie KN, Marion K, Florian P, André LG
  • Developper : Joshua M
  • Sound Designer : Yann W, 
  • Music composition : David R
